mapper.insert: insert into t_pay_log (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, PAYSERIALNO, PAYID, PAYEE, PAYEENAME, AMOUNT, PAYOR, PAYORNAME, PAYTYPE, PAYTIME, PERIODCODE, PAYLOGTYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{periodcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paylogtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_pay_log set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAYSERIALNO = #{payserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYID = #{payid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYEE = #{payee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYEENAME = #{payeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYOR = #{payor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYORNAME = #{payorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYTYPE = #{paytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYTIME = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PERIODCODE = #{periodcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYLOGTYPE = #{paylogtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, PAYSERIALNO, PAYID, PAYEE, PAYEENAME, AMOUNT, PAYOR, PAYORNAME, PAYTYPE, PAYTIME, PERIODCODE, PAYLOGTYPE from t_pay_log where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, PAYSERIALNO, PAYID, PAYEE, PAYEENAME, AMOUNT, PAYOR, PAYORNAME, PAYTYPE, PAYTIME, PERIODCODE, PAYLOGTYPE from t_pay_log
